messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] bloody brilliant
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well, I know that Liam and I said that very same thing to each other several times on the long ride home!  ;-)  (Well, maybe I was just thinking it, but I
messages.messageBody:
At 23:35 3/1/03 -0500, Ren wrote:
><< Yeah ya have, you just didn't know it! :-) >>
>
>I am just positive those were the words we used Kelly, weren't they? Standing
>in your kitchen after the conference?
>"That Joyce she's bloody brilliant" we said and nods of approval all
>around.....:)

Well, I know that Liam and I said that very same thing to each other
several times on the long ride home! ;-) (Well, maybe I was just thinking
it, but I could've sworn... And, I've certainly thought it many, many
times since then, too.)

:-)

Marji

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: bloody brilliant
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/1/03 11:58:14 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/1/03 11:58:14 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Yeah ya have, you just didn't know it! :-) >>

I am just positive those were the words we used Kelly, weren't they? Standing
in your kitchen after the conference?
"That Joyce she's bloody brilliant" we said and nods of approval all
around.....:)

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
